registration.b2b.cust_no_not_found:
The customer number/company name can't be found. Your company name needs to be as it appears on your invoice. If you can't remember your customer number, please contact us at sales.be@distrelec.com.
You can also find our phone number here.
registration.vatId.validationMessage: The VAT ID must be in the form 'BE0999999999'
